articles.title: Wingtech lands orders for new Honor smartphone sold in India, say sources - DIGITIMES
articles.description: Chinese smartphone ODMs Huaqin, Longcheer, and Wingtech are looking to expand their businesses, with Wingtech expected to assemble Honor's latest smartphone for the Indian market in India.
